questions.question: Overall physical inspection of the camera?
Is the camera lens focused and properly adjusted?
Is the property perimeter clearly displayed?
Is the camera lens free from dust and marks?
Are the motion detection sensors working?
Do all camera functions such as zoom and pan work correctly?
Is there no foliage obscuring the view?
Are cameras securely attached to the wall?
Is the day/night function of all cameras working properly?
Is the image quality of the WDR camera at the main entrance/exit?
Are the motorized zoom camera functions working properly?
What is the quality of the lift camera? Is visibility clear on all floor numbers?
ANPR camera view angle and recognition function?
What is the view angle of the ANPR camera, and does its recognition function work properly?
